What did you do last week?

I refined the scope of my project, choosing Python for data management and starting on the data collection framework. I also initiated the design for my personal website to display project updates.

What do you plan to do this week?

This week, I’ll start testing different clustering techniques for the segmentation model and view educational material to better understand machine learning. I still want to ensure that the various techniques I have learned and researched are optimal for what I want to accomplish.

Are there any impediments in your way?

Balancing this project with other academic duties is challenging, and the steep learning curve in machine learning is a potential slow-down.

Reflection on the process you used last week, how can you make the process work better?

I learned the value of a clearly defined scope. To improve, I’ll set specific weekly goals and schedule dedicated times for learning, aiming for more structured progress.
